Master Switch Is Off: All functions are disabled

SnapTools is a project aimed to provide Snapchat modifications using the Xposed Framework. We provide new functionality and features to the popular Snapchat application, in a seamless and modular way.\n\nWe use a cloud based download system to allow for straightforward updates as well as support for hotswapping of supported Snapchat versions without the need of a system reboot.
